Description:
CALLING ALL INVESTORS! Fixed term tenancy in place until December, 2020.
Picture perfect, this irresistible cottage charmer oozes character and personality. Offering something unique, this gem will pull at your heart strings with its surprising space, fabulous decor and superb location. Boasting large bedroom accommodation, an intimate dining / living area completed with a renovated kitchen, private pergola and backyard. Adding warmth and appeal to this practical floor plan is the classic period features and rustic timber floors to create a beautiful classic interior.
Further attributes include gardens shed, carport, ducted heating and more. Situated within minutes to public transport, Craigieburn Plaza, Leisure Centre, schools and other important amenities. This gem will be sold subject to a tenancy, with a fixed term lease in place until December, 2020 perfect opportunity for investors!
Inspection by appointment only
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
Nothing Could Be Finer
Occasionally-and its a special day when you make the discovery-you will find a home that fulfils every wish, satisfies every desire and leaves you wantingwell, nothing more! Here is that home. An impressive residence that makes its character and quality immediately clear throughout this 5-bedroom home.
Situated in the popular Highlands estate and within walking distance to Aitken Creek Primary School, Hume Tennis & Community Centre.
When it comes to space this home caters to the large growing family with its open plan design. A light filled living area is accompanied by an impressive kitchen which meets every need with ease. A five bedroom, two-bathroom format featuring a main bedroom with walk-in robes and ensuite confirm the family credentials, while ducted heating and air conditioning ensure constant comfort throughout.
Features include: remote controlled double garage with internal access, CCTV, bamboo flooring and double glazed windows.
Your inspection is a must!

Description:
Live in Style & Comfort !!
Now is your chance to own this house that is built with precision and high-quality inclusions. Modern and spacious, this beautifully presented home is ready for the first home buyer or astute investor. This stunning house is located in the sought after Craigieburn Highlands Estate, is designed for easy living and providing you security, privacy, and convenience.
Home Features:
• Beautifully presented 3 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms or dual living area.
• Generous master bedrooms with walk-in robe and an ensuite.
• 2700 mm High ceilings, 2340 mm Designer Doors, Bulkhead above kitchen and entry with LED lighting
• Fancy roller blinds , feature walls & Stone bench 60 mm with water fall
• Ducted refrigerated heating and cooling with 3 zones with slim line vents
• Attraction finish
floor to ceiling 800/800mm tiles & 1200/900mm Showers with niches in bathroom with rainwater shower heads and designer range Tap ware
• Under mount sink, cooktop dishwasher included and concealed rangehood
• Silk finish cabinets all over house
• Render high roof Attractive facade
• Pendant lights in living and above dining table
• Walk in pantry with water point to fridge
• Fully fenced generous backyard & front yard with landscaped garden
• Car garage with secure internal access and cooling point in garage
• Security Cameras & alarm system to fully secure the premise
• Internal Intercom, letterbox & NBN CONNECTED TURN KEY HOUSE
• Coloured concrete driveway, pathway, poxy floor paint in garage
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy 700m2 Block
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character for all home buyers alike. Offering fully equipped kitchen with, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher, main bathroom, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite featuring double vanity, open plan meals area with adjoining family room, formal lounge, study, rumpus room, double garage and much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with under cover alfresco & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, beautifully maintained carefree gardens and more. The double garage has remote control entry to go along with the side access this property has on offer which provides the perfect accessibility and storage for the boat, caravan or trailer. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & close to parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Renovated 5 bedroom on 757m2 (approx)
Multiple living zones, an abundance of bedroom accommodation, an extra large backyard and a convenient court location are just a few of the hallmarks of this recently renovated family home.
Ideally suited to the large or extended family this proudly presented home is immaculately featured throughout its practical floor plan.
Incorporating robed bedrooms, a well positioned master with ensuite, walk in robe and adjacent study. Living areas that includes a separate lounge and childrens retreat/ movie room. Engulfed in natural light the sheer size of the massive open plan meals /family room forms the centerpiece of the home. Enjoying views across the pergola to a large backyard, this space perfectly complements the sizable kitchen that features stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and storage cupboards.
The extensive driveway provides the perfect resting place for cars, trailers, boats and caravans whilst the rear accessed yard also boasts a storage shed. Sparkling timber floorboards, fully tiled central bathroom, ducted heating, ceiling fans, wood heater and spilt systems complete this homes comprehensive appeal.
Situated minutes to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Anzac Park, Splash Aquatic Centre, Craigieburn Golf Club, Willmott Park Primary School and other essential amenities (transport, medical and transport).
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Build your Dream Home in a Prestige location!
Opportunity to secure Title land in Craigieburn's best locations is yours for the taking with this fantastic 400m2 parcel.

Description:
Oh Fairways, You've done it again!
Located in the ever popular Fairways estate in Craigieburn sits this Terrace style family residence that is superb in every way.
Positioned in a peaceful court locale and directly opposite parklands, walking distance to sporting facilities and playgrounds, it really doesn't get much better than this.
Once stepping through the front door, you are instantly greeted with the feeling of home that is filled with charm, character and only the highest of quality that is sure to suit the fussiest of home buyers.
This family abode is drenched with natural light offering a very versatile and free flowing floor plan over two levels. Dual living zones downstairs featuring formal lounge with fireplace, second living zone with adjoining meals area, well-appointed gourmet kitchen with 40mm granite benchtops boasting 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and walk in pantry.
Entertain your guests in style with French doors that lead out to a stunning outdoor entertaining area.
Upstairs features 3 large bedrooms, master with full en-suite, decked out study nook, walk through wardrobe and private balcony with tranquil views. Remaining two bedrooms are complimented with a reading corner, a huge bathroom and separate toilet. Be the first home to unwind after a long day at work and relax in the corner spa bath.
Other special features include:
- Central heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Split-system aircon downstairs
- Down-lights throughout
- Remote garage with drive through to backyard & internal access.
- 2700mm High ceilings both down stairs and upstairs and
- 2400mm high solid internal doors
- Abundance of storage
- Extremely low maintenance gardens
All of this and much more only moments away from all key amenities makes this the place to be. The only thing left to do is for you to own this astonishing home and move right in!
Auction Terms:
10% Deposit required
Settlement 45-60 Days

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in the Heart of Craigieburn
More than meets the eye, this home is set to impress with its low maintenance living & instant access to all Craigieburn amenities. Whether you're a first home buyer, looking to downsize or add to your investment portfolio this is a MUST SEE!
Beyond its modern facade, this home offers 3 good size bedrooms (master with ensuite & walk-in robe), central bathroom, well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjoining meals & spacious family room leading out to a great paved entertaining area.
Further features include, remote garage with internal access, cooling, heating, alarm system, high ceilings, dual blinds & much more.
Perfectly located close to Newbury Primary School, Pelican Childcare, sporting facilities, Highlands Shopping Centre, Golden Sun Moth Park & public transport. An opportunity not to be missed.

Description:
As-New Space & Style with a Perfect Parkland Outlook
Opposite the vast expanse of Anzac Park with its delightful gardens & renowned sports
facilities, this townhouse sensation (c2019) provides an exceptional lifestyle opportunity ideal for both professionals & investors alike.
Impressive modern living, the home's light-filled interior comprises a large master bedroom with private ensuite, two additional bedrooms (both with park views), stylish main bathroom & guest powder room (third WC). Add to this a sleek stone-bench kitchen complete with tiled splashbacks & stainless steel appliances complementing the versatile open-plan living/dining area.
Other highlights of this terrific townhouse include a dedicated study alcove, ducted heating, efficient LED lighting, built-in robes, concealed laundry facilities & large linen cupboards, plus a private rear courtyard & remote-control double garage (accessed via Sapphire Mews). Also walking distance to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre & Splash Leisure Centre, buses (on Aitken Boulevard), it's close to Malcolm Creek trails along with a choice of popular primary & secondary schools. Outstanding modern living!

Description:
THE ULTIMATE PIECE OF REAL ESTATE IN THE HEART OF CRAIGIEBURN!
First time offered for sale & occupying a colossal 1467m2 is this outstanding corner positioned property where 2 blocks have been combined into 1 title providing the lucky buyer endless opportunities with its blue-chip location.
Builders, developers & investors let your imagination run wild & take a close look at this magnificent opportunity with the potential to redevelop into a multi-unit site (Subject to Council Approval.)
Conveniently located within seconds to Craigieburn train station, Craigieburn Plaza & only moments away from shops, local schools, transportation, medical centres & so much more.
Current dwelling includes 3 large bedrooms, kitchen/meals area, spacious lounge, sufficient heating & cooling, large drive-way, 2 car carport, 4 car steel garage, ceilings fans, security shutters throughout & much much more!
DO NOT LET THIS ONE PASS YOU BY!

Description:
SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437
***SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437*** Every element of this inviting home has been devised, designed and delivered to ensure an exceptional family lifestyle on a prized and rare corner allotment of a tree-lined street within minutes walk to Craigieburn Central Shopping Precinct. 3 generous double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, including a desirable downstairs master bedroom with a stylish double ensuite and walk-in robes, accompany dual living zones that each open to a refined and fully covered alfresco retreat while an open-plan kitchen features gleaming stone benches, stainless steel appliances, gas cook-top, electric oven, dish-washer as well as a walk-in pantry. A bright upstairs study space, split system heating/cooling units, new carpets and fresh paint further enhance a contemporary residence, ready to move in, that responds perfectly to all your family priorities and preferences and is additionally advantaged by an internally accessed double garage and ample integrated storage. With an abundance of amenities all within minutes from your future home including, shopping, cafe's/restaurants, schools, public transport, parks and recreation facilities. The perfect home or savvy investment!
My Agent Real Estate, a boutique agency offering a high level of service and innovative Real Estate practices to our clients right across Melbourne. Contact Adriano on 0402 055 437, or visit our web site www.myagentre.com.au where you can see all our listings and apply for our properties on line.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Cutting Edge Style - Designer Finishes
Extensive living and entertaining, space comfort and privacy, this ultra modern and stylish single level home is perfectly suited for those looking for location and quality. Hidden in a secluded quiet pocket of Craigieburn only minutes walk to the Craigieburn Central, local schools, and easy access to the freeway.
Large kitchen with quality appliances and adjoining meals with an Open plan family room and separate formal lounge, 2 luxurious bathrooms
3 generous bedrooms all with BIRa and master with WIR and en-suite.
Other features include floor boards, remote garage, Ducted heating, Cooling.
Enjoy fresh neutral tones and bright expansive interiors you will just love living here, the luxuries are limitless in this sophisticated designer residence in one of Craigieburns most sought after address.

Description:
The Perfect Start
If you are looking for that perfect first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go!
This well presented home is sure to impress, with features on hand such as ducted heating & split system cooling, formal lounge, open plan kitchen/meals/family area with stainless steel appliances, main bathroom, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, good quality carpets & blinds.
Also offering a double garage with drive through access to another double carport which is perfect for storage of the boat, caravan or trailer PLUS a 6X6m garage with separate power supply and circuit board, 2x 15amp GPO outlets and fluorescent lighting.
All set on an allotment of approximately 480m2 and very ideally located within close proximity to the Craigieburn train station, local schools & shops. Inspection is a must with this property, don't let this opportunity pass you buy. THIS ONE WON'T HANG AROUND FOR LONG.

Description:
TICKING ALL THE BOXES ON 650m2!
Perfectly positioned & flawlessly presented are words rarely strung together in a sentence about a home, however, this property is all that & more!
Comprising of 3 great size bedrooms, the master bedroom leads to the ensuite with mirrored built-in robe, updated central bathroom, roomy laundry & well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances as well as ample cupboard space overlooking a spacious meals area.
Flowing seamlessly outdoors, take a step outside to see the massive pergola which overlooks a stunning oversized backyard where you can entertain family & friends all year round & watch the kids play until their heart's content on a super-sized allotment encased with established gardens & lush green grass.
The double garage is currently set up with a second kitchen, sink & drive-thru access.
Ducted heating & evaporative cooling, 14 solar panels with 5.4kw inverter, large garden shed with power, security cameras & alarm system all topping off a huge list of brilliant creature comforts.
This home really is offering the lifestyle you truly desire & within minutes to local schools, parklands, public transport, shops & bus stop within walking distance. An amazing home like this property truly deserves your inspection.

Description:
Designer Style with Every Aston Advantage
Beautifully appointed & impeccably presented, this architect-designed ex-display residence
(by Boutique Homes) delivers an exceptional environment of quality & versatility - positioned to perfection with immediate access to the Aston's key lifestyle attractions.
Bathed in natural light, the home's intelligent interior comprises 3 bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe) & dedicated study, stylish ensuite & equally-impressive main bathroom - both with stone-top vanities. Multiple living zones include a formal lounge, spacious theatre room (converted double garage) & expansive open-plan family/dining area complemented by a superb stone-bench kitchen complete with breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks, stainless steel appliances & ample cupboard space.
Other stand-out features of this remarkable home include split-system heating & cooling,
alarm & CCTV, NBN connection, 10kW solar power system & efficient LED lighting throughout, plus a fabulous al-fresco entertaining area, established gardens & high fences for
added privacy.
Walking distance to Aston's renowned parkland, sports facilities & Aitken Creek trails, it's
close to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre as well as Aitkin Hill Primary School & the
brand-new Elevation Secondary College.
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn
Insights: 21 Cavalier Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime location..
This inviting home is situated in a prime location within walking distance to several amenities including Craigieburn Railway Station, Craigieburn South Primary School and Craigieburn Plaza Shopping Centre.
Such an envious location is enhanced by a large parcel of land measuring approximately 814m2, providing a fantastic opportunity for developers(STCA), savvy investors or homebuyers alike.
Generous living areas include separate lounge room, rumpus room or 4th bedroom, meals area and functional kitchen. Three bedrooms, including a main bedroom with semi ensuite, main bathroom and a separate laundry completes this home.
Extras include gas ducted heating, air conditioning, and double garage.
Insights: 24 Milburn Place, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Cleverly designed to be larger than life
Featuring a generous open plan family & meals, large open kitchen with a butlers pantry, theatre room and a separate guest suite with its own bathroom and robe on the ground floor, while still allowing for 3 bedrooms totaling 5 bedrooms throughout, retreat and a generous master suite on the first floor. With its clever layout and accommodating design, the Balmoral perfectly caters for a large family all while offering a touch of luxury for everyday living.

Description:
Welcome Home - Henley Masterpiece!
Perfectly positioned in Bridges Estate, imagine your dreams coming alive in this house that proves to be a spectacular starter package for creating lasting memories.
This newly built Henley home demonstrates a visual treat with 2 well designed open plan living areas, 4 spacious bedrooms including Master with ensuite & walk-in robe.
The spacious well-appointed kitchen consists of grand Caesar stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel stand-alone oven, ample cupboard space plus a large walk in pantry. This home also boasts a great sized laundry, central bathroom & remote entry double car garage.
This modern home has a beautiful combination of comfort & space, combined with natural light to all rooms that is sure to catch the attention of the fussiest of home occupiers or investors.
PLEASE NOTE: Photos are for illustration purposes only.
Insights: 5 Delaware Road, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
